translation: Whatever is sacrificed, given, or performed, and whatever austerity is practiced without faith, it is called 'Asat', O Arjuna; it is of no value here or hereafter (after death).
commentary: 17.28 without faith? Hutam is sacrificed? given given? Tapas austerity? Taptam is practiced? done performed? f and? That whatever? Asat Asat? It is thus? is called is called? Partha O Partha? Not not? f and? That that? Pretya hereafter (after death)? Not not? Ih here.Commentary Asat That which changes form and has no permanent existence. It does not mean nonexistence as such.Acts of sacrifice? austerity
